answerText: Mount Kinabalu[10] Mount Kinabalu is located in the Sabah region of Borneo, which is the second largest state in Malaysia, after this one, which is also located on Borneo. Its capital is Kuching.
heading: QUARK |2012 | 1 | 18 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: The film The Place of the Dead describes an expedition by the British Army to climb this mountain and explore its Low's gully, which goes horribly wrong. For 10 points each: [10] Name this peak, which is the tallest mountain of the Crocker Range on the third largest island in the world.
